ygData.subject: RE: Don't go to Befallen at level 9!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: If train is the cause to make to hate Befallen, pls dont go there until lvl 30. I ve hunt there when I am lvl 6, and I leave there at lvl 16 then go to unrest.
ygData.messageBody:
If train is the cause to make to hate Befallen, pls
dont go there until lvl 30. I've hunt there when I am
lvl 6, and I leave there at lvl 16 then go to unrest.
My other Paladin char is lvl 22 and will still die in
lvl 3 if play in solo. Also, I've seem a lvl 22 char
die twice a night by elf skel, ghoul, necro train. So
if u dont want see any train, just dont go befallen
and unrest.

--- Chris Wheeler <wheelech@...> wrote:
> From: Chris Wheeler <wheelech@...>
>
> I agree.
>
> The past three nights I have been floating between
> lvl 11 and lvl 12 in
> befallen. The trains can just be too tough. And on
> the Rathe, there are
> rarely enough players to help you out of a pinch
> when that train of dread
> bones, greater skels, zombies and ghouls come
> running by! Not to mention
> the fact that you have to be extremely careful not
> to fall down those
> winding and rocky stairs as you are trying to run
> back to safety, else you
> are toast!
>
> I am not returning there until at least lvl 14, and
> even then, I will think
> twice.
>
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Kevin Dailey [mailto:Kevin_Dailey@...]
> Sent: 1999/09/27 11:32 AM
> To: 'EQ-Clerics@onelist.com'
> Subject: [EQ-Clerics] Don't go to Befallen at level
> 9!!!
>
>
> From: Kevin Dailey <Kevin_Dailey@...>
>
> Mikaela wrote:
>
> "Go to Befallen. It's a great place for a cleric
> your level [level 9].
> I spent levels
> 9 - 16 in Befallen in beta and had a blast."
>
>
> Saidinn Witchwood responds:
>
> *GASP*
>
> Go to Befallen as a level 9 cleric? HA HA HA HA HA
> HA HA!
>
> Oh my, that was a good one Mikaela. *shakes head in
> friendly disbelief*
> :)
>
> Wixn, PLEASE don't go to Befallen until you are at
> least level 15, and
> have an experienced group with you. Even then, you
> will most likely find
> yourself spending many happy hours trying to recover
> your corpse. The
> problem is that you will quickly get bored with the
> first level, and
> will convince yourself that the lower levels can't
> be all that bad.
> Well, they are. And the loot isn't all that great,
> either.
>
> Trust me, I have many friends who swear they will
> never return to that
> place. And these people are good players.
>
> Saidinn Witchwood
>
> P.S. I know there are probably some of you out there
> who actually love
> Befallen, but PLEASE, can we at least agree that
> Wixl shouldn't go to
> Befallen until at least level 15?
>
> P.P.S No hard feelings, Mikaela :)
>
